pr_title: Make Type classes safe to use in concurrent loading

timeline.message: Make Type classes safe to use in concurrent loading

timeline.bodyText: I don't think calling get() while another thread is in the middle of computeIfAbsent is thread-safe
timeline.author: gigaherz

replies.bodyText: So I did some reading, and it turns out computeIfAbset that ConcurrentHashMap actually allows the behaviour as I used it, however, computeIfAbsent is already enoguh, as the implementation for ConcurrentHashMap is written so it guranteeres that not race condition will occur
replies.author: ichttt
